news_insight_text_link.news_insight_description: The Supreme Court of Victoria has ordered the liquidation of Bardee, a deep tech start-up backed by Australia's largest venture capital fund. The company, which had landed a deal with hardware giant Bunnings to stock its products, collapsed following the death of a worker on the job last year.

org_similarity_summary.insight_similar_orgs: Bardee and TeleSense, AgriDigital, AgroStar, Pure Harvest Smart Farms, and Agriprotein are all part of the agricultural technology (AgTech) sector. TeleSense and AgriDigital focus on monitoring and simplifying supply chains, while AgroStar and Pure Harvest Smart Farms work on improving agricultural production. Agriprotein specializes in sustainable protein sources for animal feed.

about_short_description.short_description: Bardee is an agtech that break down food waste, converting it into fertliser and proteins for pet foods and chicken feed.

product.name: Superfly Organic Fertiliser
product.description: A sustainable fertiliser and soil enhancer made from black soldier fly castings, designed to improve soil health and plant growth.

product.name: Hydrofly Indoor Plant Food
product.description: A concentrated liquid soil tonic for indoor plants, containing kelp, beneficial microbes, chitin, and wood vinegar to promote root growth.
